text: Ōmiya Hachiman Shrine 大宮八幡宮 Affiliation Festival Location Geographic coordinates Glossary of Shinto is a Shinto shrine in Suginami, Tokyo, Japan. It is a Hachiman shrine, that worships Hachiman. It was built in 1063. Its main festival is held annually on September 15. Emperors are also worshipped here. Emperor Ōjin, Empress Jingū and Emperor Chūai are worshipped here too. == Other websites == * Official website Category:Hachiman shrines Category:Beppyo shrines Category:Pages with unreviewed translations Category:Fuken-sha Category:Shinto shrines in Tokyo
title: Ōmiya Hachiman Shrine (Tokyo)
